question: According to its nutritional info, a bag of cookies has 300 calories per serving. If a 300 grams bag has 5 servings, how many gramss can you eat if your daily calorie target is 1900 and you have already consumed 775 calories?
answer:
If the total calorie target is 1900 and I have consumed 775 calories then I have 1900-775 = <<1900-775=1125>>1125 calories left to eat
If each serving of cookies has 300 calories and I only have 1125 calories left to eat, then I can only eat 1125/300 of a serving = 15/4 of a serving
We also know that a 300 grams bag of cookies has 5 servings, hence each serving has 300 grams/5 = <<300/5=60>>60 gramss
If I can only eat 15/4 of a serving, then I can eat only 60 grams * 15/4 = 225 gramss
#### 225
